WHO WE ARE

We’re Resolution, an award-winning, full-service advertising agency headquartered in Athens, Georgia for over twenty years. We love you.

Our goal is to provide better strategy, better design, better development, better content, and ultimately better results for your business. We’re a better design agency. We're your agency.

meet your team

“We couldn't have been happier working with everyone at Resolution.”

— Bob Sleppy, Nuçi’s Space

WHAT WE DO

From branding and identity, websites, business cards, car wraps, catalogs, billboards, and annual reports, we provide what you need.

Strategy and marketing.

Every Resolution project begins with a strategy session where we learn as much as we can about your business, your audience, and your goals. We use that information to tailor a custom marketing plan which optimizes your message for your audience and maximizes your advertising dollar.

Identity.

Web.

our services

HOW WE DIFFER

We’ve been in this business for a long time and worked for multiple other agencies large and small. We learned who we wanted to be and who we didn’t. We’re different from other agencies in the way we treat our clients. We’re small, focused, and attentive to your business objectives.

our blog

WHY IT MATTERS

Our world is increasingly information-rich and time-poor. Your brand faces fierce competition for the hearts and minds of your audience. Consumers are faced with more choices than ever before. They are more connected and better informed. The channels for reaching them are changing. We help you leverage the changes while remaining focused on what hasn’t changed—thier humanity.

We help you stand out.
